Welcome to INV_outlier_package’s documentation!¶

univariate.py¶

Contains the definition of the UnivariateOutlierDetection class.

class outlierdetection.univariate.UnivariateOutlierDetection(series)¶

Univariate outlier detection class.

Initializes a univariate outlier detector with a time series.

Parameters:

series (pd.Series) – Pandas Series containing the time series. Index has to be a pd.DatetimeIndex. Values are float and may be np.nan. Duplicate indices are removed, first are kept.

GetSeries()¶

Returns the stored time series.

Returns:

self.series – pd.Series stored.

Return type:

stored time series

outlierdetection.univariate.process_last_point(ts, ts_dates)¶

Simplest one-line call, takes time series values and dates as lists.

univariate_preprocessors.py¶

Contains the definition of preprocessors that can be applied to the time series data.
